channel.title: Need help trying to get 10x hits on my server! Please
channel.description: My server is a 562 running 659. My hit points show 999, and when i get hit it drops normally. When i get hurt, the enemies hurt me 10x. (Example: Instead of getting hit a 10, they hit 100) But when i fight something, it doesn't hit me the 10x hits :mad:. (Example: When i hit 10, it doesn't hit 100 it just hits 10). If anyone is able to help me, please do. Thank you everyone! :D

item.title: Need help trying to get 10x hits on my server! Please
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Hey dude what you need to do is
in your boolean process() add

ATTACKHP = 1 * 10;

then you just multiply by ATTACKHP and it works all the time.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help trying to get 10x hits on my server! Please

item.title: Need help trying to get 10x hits on my server! Please
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Find the x10 from a monster and apply the method to when a player hits you.

Read full topic
